hamadema sellamata aran innawa wage pena wagakiwa yuththo diha api saken baluwe kenthiyen baluwe.eeth eyala aththatama sellan karanawa kiyala me lagadi hamabanthota paththedi oppu wuna.sellan polisiya bala iddi sellan nagaradhipathi kenek awith lellan karana natumak nataddi sellan polisiya sellamata wage athe thibunu awi aayudha paththakin thiyala hm saddayak nathiwa sellamak kala.ee aya wachanayak katha kale naha hariyata dath pennuwoth awut karana sellamata innawa wage.

wadath saralawa prabala sathyayak kiyathoth, ek ek aya thama thama kayika saha manasika hakiyawan, kapawima, karya shurathwaya, nirmanashilithwaya, pragnyawa, ugath kama, buddhiya pamanata melowa sampath thama thamange prayojanaya udesa bhawithayata idahasara sakasa gani yana sobadahamata ekanga yatharthayata pitu pa, paripurna susadhitha samanathmathawayak gana manorajikathwayak nirmanaya kara ganima…memagin nirmanashilithwayata wata bandima….ihatha ki sadhaka swabhawikawama wichalya wana minis prajawaka ee wichlyayanta uruma wapasariya laba nodima nisa adayam wardhanaya, nishpadana saha sewa wiwidhathwayehi, gunathmaka bhawayehi wardhanaya adala kara, ekathana pal wena aarthikayak saha samajayak nirmanaya karaganima…
